items.title: Great Leaders Share the Fires They’re Fighting
items.description: Being transparent about mistakes and challenges builds trust and keeps culture intact.

items.title: 7 Non-Negotiable Rules for Launching a Successful Startup
items.description: Successful businesses have little or nothing to do with chance or good fortune.

items.title: How This Serial Entrepreneur Is Making It Easier for Anyone to Build With AI
items.description: PepperMill co-founder Anh Hatzopoulos shares her advice on building successful businesses, leading teams, and getting to the IPO stage.

items.title: How to Protect Your Company From the Worst Effects of Social Media
items.description: TikTok, Instagram, Pinterest can be huge distractions at work. Other social content can derail team collaboration.

items.title: Reid Hoffman and David Sacks Are Feuding on X Over AI and ‘Dirty Tricks’
items.description: Hoffman recently opened up to Inc. about technology’s role in politics and his vision for AI regulation.
